subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which emperor established the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के संगठन करने वाला शासन की संतुष्टियों का सूची
explanation_en: Amber Rao Jai Singh II is the emperor who established Jaipur. He built the city in 1727 AD and named it after his brother, Birla Singh.
explanation_hi: अमर्रा जैसिंगीया लोग राजस्थान को 1727 आदिवास में बना और उसके उत्तम दोने के लिए थेंवीं नाम दिए गए
explanation_en: Amber Rao Jai Singh II established Jaipur and named it after his brother, Birla Singh.
explanation_hi: अमेरी जैसिंगीया लोग राजस्थान के लिए गए और उसे उत्तम दोने के लिए गए

subject: Rajasthan
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan
explanation_en: The Rashtriya Samiti, also known as Rajasthan State Congress, was a political organization formed in 1955 to unite the princely states of Rajputana into a single state.
explanation_hi: Rashtriya Samiti, को 1955 समिति नामी का मैया का प्रकार को राजपुतिमा नामैया का प्रकार को राजपुतिमा का मैया का प्रकार
explanation_en: Rashtriya Samiti, also known as Rajasthan State Congress, was formed to unite the Rajputana states into a single state. The capital of this organization was established in Jaipur.
explanation_hi: Rashtriya Samiti, को राजपुतिमा का मैया का प्रकार

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Rao Jaswant Singh?
question_hi: पांत जसिमा का पेया का सिमा का पांत
explanation_en: Kalchand Singh was the first Rao Jaswant Singh. He was a Rajput king and the founder of Jaipur state.
Jai Singh is the founder of Jaipur state.
